hopobject.name: 0xdroid
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; zh-TW; rv:1.9.0.13) Gecko/2009073022 Firefox/3.0.13 (.NET CLR 3.5.30729)
hopobject.body:
0xlab develops Android distributions and attempts to introduce some improvements recently. Currently, 0xdroid supports TI Beagleboard as reference hardware, and Android cupcake branch is tracked by 0xdroid in "beagle-cupcake" branch.
SCM: http://gitorious.org/0xdroid Wiki: http://gitorious.org/0xdroid/pages/Home
hopobject.shortdesc: 0xlab's enhanced Android distribution, highly tweaked for Beagleboard
